patthana17.26:1.1: Pītisahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:2.1: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:3.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:4.1: Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati …pe… avigate ekavīsati. (Vedanāttikasadisaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
